name: hallway
intro: You are standing in a hallway. At the end you can see a staircase leading down into the basement. To your right you can smell new baked cookies. The door behind you is locked.

name: kitchen
intro: This clearly is a kitchen. There is a cookie dough scented candle lit on the kitchen table.

name: basement
intro: It's too dark to see anything. You can sense the smell of wet stone and something foul.
